name: Pine Glen 19x23 Rectangle Pool Deck Plan – Spacious Above-Ground Pool Deck with Lounge & Dining
open_features: (16) 18×18×12 in reinforced concrete footings with 6×6 SP No. 2 posts
Stair footing 48×24×4 in with 2×12 stringers @ 12 in O.C.
Beams (1-5): (2) 2×12 SP No. 2 each span, continuous perimeter grid
Joists: 2×8 SP No. 2 @ 16 in O.C. with 2×4 battens @ 24 in O.C.
Decking: 2×6 composite boards with 1/8 in gap after drying
Railings: 4×4 posts @ 4 ft O.C. with 2×4 rails and 2×2 balusters (≤ 4 in spacing)
Hardware: Simpson ABU66Z bases, HUC412 hangers, LUS28 hangers, A34 clips, LPC4Z caps, LSC connectors
Integrated lounge and dining platform with wrap deck around 31′×16′ pool (designed by others)
safety_note: Plans are for preliminary educational use only. Verify pool safety, bonding, and local code compliance with a licensed professional before construction.
